util.linalg

Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.linalg.Matrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Copyable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiagonalMatrix, LowerTriangularMatrix, RectangularMatrix, UpperTriangularMatrix

    public abstract class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Copyable
    A class representing a matrix, with linear algebra operations
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
